description:
Over 5 million people speak the Albanian language! This language is spoken all over the world in many different countries but primarily in Albania, Kosovo, Macedonia, and Montenegro. This course is designed to offer a basic introduction into the Albanian language.

In this course you will learn:

  • About Albanian culture.
  • The alphabet
  • Verb conjugations and pronouns
  • Common phrases for greetings, numbers, money, shopping, and so much more.

This course consists of interactive videos and printouts. We will be continuously adding and growing this course for a deeper and richer learning experience. Once you are done with this course you will be able to get around in Albania. You will be able to converse with native speakers and will have a solid foundation for further study!
title: Albanian Phrasebook
